title: His Mouth May Be A Deal Breaker
itunes:title: His Mouth May Be A Deal Breaker
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I'm a 45 year old woman and I've finally met Mr. Right, or so I thought. He has a steady job, a nice home and treats me like a queen! We've been dating two years and he recently proposed to me, but there’s just one issue with him that needs to be fixed before I agree to marry him. It’s his language. Steve, I know you are proud of your cussing skills so I need your help. Whenever my man gets frustrated, he cusses like there’s no tomorrow. Shortly after we met, he visited my church with me and while the sermon was going on, he got a call from his ex-wife.............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
